description: A lytic lesion refers to an area of bone loss or destruction.

attributes.name: presence
attributes.description: Indicates whether the lytic lesion is present or absent.

values.name: present
values.description: The lytic lesion is present.

values.name: absent
values.description: The lytic lesion is absent.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Describes the status of the lytic lesion.

values.name: stable
values.description: The lytic lesion is stable.

values.name: enlarging
values.description: The lytic lesion is enlarging.

values.name: decreased
values.description: The lytic lesion is decreased.

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: Specifies the location of the lytic lesion.

values.name: select list for bones
values.description: The location of the lytic lesion is selectable from a list of bones.

values.name: other
values.description: Location is specified in free text.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Indicates the size of the lytic lesion.

values.name: small
values.description: <1 cm

values.name: medium
values.description: 1-2 cm

values.name: large
values.description: >2 cm

attributes.name: number
attributes.description: Specifies the number of lytic lesions.

values.name: single
values.description: There is a single lytic lesion.

values.name: multiple
values.description: There are multiple lytic lesions.

attributes.name: margin
attributes.description: Describes the margin of the lytic lesion.

values.name: well-defined
values.description: The margin of the lytic lesion is well-defined.

values.name: ill-defined
values.description: The margin of the lytic lesion is ill-defined.

attributes.name: density
attributes.description: Indicates the density of the lytic lesion.

values.name: high
values.description: The density of the lytic lesion is high.

values.name: low
values.description: The density of the lytic lesion is low.

values.name: mixed
values.description: The density of the lytic lesion is mixed.

attributes.name: extra-osseous extension
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is extra-osseous extension of the lytic lesion.

values.name: present
values.description: There is extra-osseous extension of the lytic lesion.

values.name: absent
values.description: There is no extra-osseous extension of the lytic lesion.

attributes.name: soft tissue component
attributes.description: Specifies whether there is a soft tissue component associated with the lytic lesion.

values.name: yes
values.description: There is a soft tissue component associated with the lytic lesion.

values.name: no
values.description: There is no soft tissue component associated with the lytic lesion.

attributes.name: pathologic fracture
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is a pathologic fracture associated with the lytic lesion.

values.name: yes
values.description: There is a pathologic fracture associated with the lytic lesion.

values.name: no
values.description: There is no pathologic fracture associated with the lytic lesion.

attributes.name: surrounding bone sclerosis
attributes.description: Specifies whether there is surrounding bone sclerosis associated with the lytic lesion.

values.name: yes
values.description: There is surrounding bone sclerosis associated with the lytic lesion.

values.name: no
values.description: There is no surrounding bone sclerosis associated with the lytic lesion.
